column3: aso ampa dɛ hom ka nsɛntsenenee? Nyimpa mba
column4: aso atsɛn tsenenee na hom bu yi?"

column3: hom dzi asɛmbɔn wɔ akoma mu; Hom nsamu akatabansɛm na hom ker dze ma wɔ asaase do."

column2: "Ndzebɔnyɛfo bɔ ko fi yafun mu: Wɔwo hɔn ara a na wɔafom kwan
"Hɔn bɔr tse dɛ abowatsena no bɔr: Wɔtse dɛ ehurutsia tsitsifo a osisiw n'aso;"

column3: Kaansa ɔrekantse nyansa mu dɛn ara mpo a."
bubu hɔn se wɔ hɔn anomu: EWURADZE

column2: "Ma wɔnwew dɛ nsu a oruhuam: Sɛ ɔtaa n'egyen a
"Ma wɔnyɛ dɛ ɔwaa a ɔnan sen kɔ: Ɔtse dɛ ɔba a ɔbaa apon a oennhu ewia da."
"Ansaana hom nkutu bɛtse nsoɛ ne hyew no

column3: n'enyi bɛgye: Ɔbɔhohor n'anan ho wɔ ndzebɔnyɛfo bɔgyaa mu."

column4: akatua pa wɔ hɔ ma ɔtseneneenyi: Ampaara
column5: Nyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ a obu atsɛn wɔ asaase do."
